1136170.name: Fantasy Grounds - Meander Map Pack: Interior City (Map Pack)
1136170.description:
Meander Map Pack: Interior City

This exciting new series of map packs will finally open up the option for building huge destinations to which all the other hundreds of Meanders can lead.
This pack features a huge assortment of 30 New Maps from my Fantasy City Kickstarter with fully furnished interiors. Set in the Spring/Default Fantasy City environment this comprehensive map pack lets you take the action indoors with a huge assortment of shops, trades, homes and beautifully decorated building interiors.
  • Castle Entrance to Forest
  • Castle Entrance to Desert
  • Castle Entrance to Jungle
  • Castle Entrance to Snow
  • Homes Castle Shops Cathedral
  • Homes Carpenter Castle Cathedral
  • Cathedral Tavern Kitchen
  • Gambling Den Gaming Room Tea House
  • Luxury Homes Alchemy Lab
  • Assorted Homes Wizards Abode
  • Museum Archaeologist Homes and Halfling Home
  • Luxury Home Cultists Den Homes
  • Meat Cleavers Meatworks
  • Grocery Store Restaurant Kitchen Warehouse
  • Ruined Warehouses and Restaurant
  • Shops Forge Stores and Library
  • Fortune Teller Archives Homes
  • Tavern and Sleeping Quarters
  • Cathedral
  • Poor Homes
  • Poor Homes Gambling Den
  • Theatre Stage Auditorium and Warehouse
  • Arcane Library Homes Shops
  • Storage Butcher Baker Petstore
  • Large Warehouse
  • Poor Homes Gambling Den
  • Alchemists Stores Florist Magery
  • Tavern Inn Homes
  • Tavern Courtyard and Homes
  • Tavern Gambling Den Dining Room and Bar
Maps are sized specially for FG at 1350x900 and under 500 kb each to help prevent slow-down during play. DM Convenience is the focus with carefully labelled maps and several ways to access, use and choose the maps in this module. Use the VISUAL MAP SELECTION PANEL and pick your map from the thumbnails and yellow label by clicking on the pin. Or use the RANDOM ROLL TABLES to pick your destination at random.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
